channel.title: Posts on Dan Maxbauer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Dan Maxbauer

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Hello! I created this blog as a place for me to learn new things and write about them. For my day job, I’m a visiting professor in geology at Carleton College. I teach about climate, paleobiology, and introductory geology. Its great and I love it. For my academic work, I regularly use R and have since I was a master’s student (~5 years now). I have wanted to be fancy and start a blog using Blogdown for a while, so, here it is.
